missingData.title: Missing Data
missingData.description: Your last login and/or last logout data returned undefined for the Friend module. Login and logout notifications are now disabled. This may be a result of disabling the `Online` API option on Hypixel or setting your social status to offline. Notifications will resume and you will receive another DM once this data is no longer missing.

receivedData.description: Your last login and/or last logout data is no longer undefined for the Friend module. Login and logout notifications will now resume.
